marklogic.body:
Guthrie, Chacin, Nicasio, Pomeranz and Moyer. Go five deep with starters.
Chacin is deserving of the no. 2 Spot and can be the no. 1 one day. Pomeranz should not skip starts. Build his arm strength, just limit the types of pitches he throws (easy on the breaking balls, especially the curve) and how many pitches. Moyer should not be expected, at 49 to be higher in the rotation. Be happy he's a capable no. 5 and decide who will be the effective Spot starter for anyone in the top 5 who needs a start or more Off.
